title: Yen Jeevan Lyrics Theri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Theri Yen Jeevan Song Lyrics English Meaning
Singers: Hariharan, Saindhavi
Music: GV Prakash Kumar
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Unnaale ennaalum
en jeevan
vaazhudhae.

sollaamal un swaasam
en moochil
seruthae.

un kaigal korkkum
or nodi.
en kangal oram
neer thili.

un maarbil saaindhu
saaga thonudhae.

Unnaale ennaalum
en jeevan
vaazhudhae.

sollaamal unswaasam
en moochil
seruthae.

Vidindhaalum vaanam
irul poosa vendum.
madi meedhu saaindhu
kadhai pesa vendum.

mudiyaadha paarvai
nee veesa vendum.
muzhu neram enmel
un vaasam vendum.

inbam edhuvarai
naam povom adhuvarai

nee paarkka paarkka
kaadhal koodudhe.

Unnaale ennaalum
en jeevan
vaazhudhae.

sollaamal unswaasam
en moochil
seruthae.

Aeraalam aasai
en nenjil thondrum
adhai yaavum pesa
pala jenmam vendum

aezhaezhu jenmam
ondraaga sendhu
onoodu indrae
naan vazha vendum

kaalam mudiyalaam
nam kadhal mudiyumaa

nee paarkka paarkka
kaadhal koodudhe.

Unnaale ennaalum
en jeevan
vaazhudhae.

sollaamal unswaasam
en moochil
seruthae.

un kaigal korkkum
or nodi
en kangal oram
neer thili.

un maarbil saaindhu
saaga thonudhae.

Unnaale ennaalum
en jeevan
vaazhudhae.

sollaamal unswaasam
en moochil
seruthae.		 English Meaning
I tried my best :)
I’ll live my life
for ever
coz of you.

your breath
reaches
my breath

While I hold
your hands,
There is tear
from my eyes.

want to die leaning
on your chest.

I’ll live my life
for ever
coz of you.

your breath
reaches
my breath

Let the night
extend.
Want to lie on
your lap and chat.

Keep seeing
me every day.
Want your smell
on me all the day.

Let us go together
till happiness ends.

Love is increasing
When you keep seeing me

I’ll live my life
for ever
coz of you.

your breath
reaches
my breath

Lots of desire
arises in my heart.
Need many lifetime
to discuss with you.

I want to
live with you
together for
many lifetimes.

Time can end,
Our love never ends.

Love is increasing
When you keep seeing me

I’ll live my life
for ever
coz of you.

your breath
reaches
my breath

While I hold
your hands,
There is tear
from my eyes.

want to die leaning
on your chest.

I’ll live my life
for ever
coz of you.

your breath
Is reaching
my breath
